text: @paulsperry_ @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus cause the common cold, upper respiratory infection and flu. But just think how you don’t hear Covid 19 very much. You just here Coronavirus why everything falls under it. But Covid 19 is the new virus that’s the one we shut everything down over.
